segments.text: I wonder if you could help me find something for my daughter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think she'd like a laptop ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that would be perfect .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A Mac is something most people appreciate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In fact , she prefers Macs . How much is one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our 15 - inch Pro will cost you only $ 2,100 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She's going to be so happy . Let me have one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You've made a good decision . How would you like to pay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll pay for it with my VISA .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's all yours after you sign here , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are there any extras that she needs ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is good to go . If she wants accessories , just visit us again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You've been so helpful . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have a nice day , and thank you for shopping here .
segments.speaker: S2
